channel.title: Vladimir Campos
channel.description: My interests span a wide range, but they must truly ignite my passion. Only then can I fully engage with a topic.

item.title: I seriously need to use the bathroomâ€¦
item.description: I am aware that I should not have done so, but I pressed the upper-left button on my Garmin to illuminate its display. Every time this happens, there are two possible outcomes. When I see that it is about 2 or 3 in the morning, it's so difficult to fall asleep again. Yes, I know, that's why we should never check the time. Anyway, when it is past 5 a.m., I magically sleep seconds after checking the time or coming back from the bathroom. Our brains are so weirdly wired.

item.title: My super simple Google Calendar hack for Obsidian
item.description: Having both Obsidian and Google Calendar constantly open, was driving me a little crazy because of all the back and forth. Now, one click and I'm there. So simple, so helpful.

item.title: I freed my Kindle library and have it synchronized with all my devices
item.description: First, I converted the books to ePub using Calibre. Next, they joined my Obsidian Timeline System for automatic sync across all devices...
